NewsArticle.Title: Happy Holidays!
NewsArticle.Content: Visit Frosty at Loures Castle to receive your Holiday Gift (XMas Bonus Exp-Ap(x10)). ((Registered players only. Must be insight 99. Frosty will melt after the holidays. Get your gift before he's gone!)) *The XMas Bonus Exp-Ap(x10) is trade-able, but the contents inside are NOT.* *This event will start after the reset on Thursday, Dec. 29th* Happy Holidays!
